fields.title: Tax Payer Name - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtTaxPyrSSN
fields.title: Tax Payer SSN - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtTipsSocMed
fields.title: Line 1. Tips received by employees for services on which you paid or incurred employer social security and Medicare taxes during the tax year

fields.name: txtTipsNotCredit
fields.title: Line 2. Tips not subject to the credit provisions

fields.name: txtCreditTips
fields.title: Line 3. Creditable tips. Subtract line 2 from line 1 - This field is automatically calculated for you

options.label: Check here, If you had any tipped employees whose wages (including tips) exceeded $142, 800

fields.name: txtMulLin3765
fields.title: Line 4. Multiply line 3 by 7. 65% (0. 0765). If you had any tipped employees whose wages (including  atips) exceeded $142, 800 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtFr8846Credits
fields.title: Line 5. Credit for employer social security and Medicare taxes paid on certain employee tips from partnerships and S corporations

fields.name: txtCurrYrCredit
fields.title: Line 6. Add lines 4 and 5. Partnerships and S corporations, report this amount on Schedule K. All others, report this amount on Form 3800, Part III, line 4f - This field is automatically calculated for you
